BEAM.name: Power Beam
BEAM.description: Standard Chozo-built beam weapon. Low power, but extremely energy-efficient.

BOMB.name: Bombs
BOMB.description: Basic weapon useable in Morph Ball form with utility for exploration and traversal.

CHARGEBEAM.name: Charge Beam
CHARGEBEAM.description: Upgrade for the Arm Cannon that allows the equipped beam type to be charged for higher damage output.

ETANK.name: Energy Tank
ETANK.description: A vital component of the Power Suit. Increases energy capacity by 100.

VARIA.name: Varia Suit
VARIA.description: Increases the heat-resisting ability of the Power Suit, allowing its wearer to traverse heated environments

GRAVITY.name: Gravity Suit
GRAVITY.description: Allows the wearer to move freely within fluids. Inherits and improves the heat-resisting ability of the Varia suit.

HIGHJUMP.name: High Jump Boots
HIGHJUMP.description: Significantly improves the Power Suit's maximum jump height

ICEBEAM.name: Ice Beam
ICEBEAM.description: Instantly freezes small objects such as creatures and projectiles on contact, increasing their vulnerability and allowing them to be used as platforms.

MISSILE.name: Missiles
MISSILE.description: Basic explosive projectile. Capable of dealing high damage in a small radius upon contact.

MORPHBALL.name: Morph Ball
MORPHBALL.description: Highly advanced Chozo invention which allows the user to become small and round. Enables use of certain weapons including bombs.

PLASMABEAM.name: Plasma Beam
PLASMABEAM.description: Beam with an extremely damage output. Able to through multiple entities while maintaining energy, only dissipating upon contact with a solid surface.

POWERBOMB.name: Power Bombs
POWERBOMB.description: The most powerful weapon known to be created by the Chozo. Anything caught in the large blast radius is likely to sustain extreme damage.

POWERGRIP.name: Power Grip
POWERGRIP.description: Utility feature of the Power Suit which allows the weared to grab onto ledges, and then climb up onto the surface at any time.
